definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: In all our work we must persevere in the Anti-Japanese National United Front as the general policy.
sentences.chinese: 在一切工作中，应该坚持抗日民族统一战线的总方针。

sentences.english: The fundamental "open-up" policy should be persevered throughout.
sentences.chinese: 我们要坚持改革开放的总方针。

sentences.english: Under that general policy, research on the atomic bomb was begun.
sentences.chinese: 在这一总方针的指导下，原子弹方面的研究开始了。

sentences.english: Military plans on these lines must be made, in keeping with the general policy of resolute armed resistance.
sentences.chinese: 按照坚决抗战的总方针，必须作如上各项的军事计划。

sentences.english: The committee are busy laying down a general policy.
sentences.chinese: 委员会正忙于制定一个总方针。

sentences.english: The society synthesis governing is general policy of our country to solve the social question.
sentences.chinese: 社会综合治理是我国解决社会治安问题的总方针。

definition: the eight-character slogan for the economic policy proposed by 李富春[Li3 Fu4 chun1] in 1961: 調整、鞏固、充實、提高|调整、巩固、充实、提高 "adjust, consolidate, enrich and improve"/a policy expressed as an eight-character slogan
major policy of the national government
to implement/to put into practice/to carry out
refers to 百花運動|百花运动[Bai3 hua1 Yun4 dong4] with its slogan 百花齊放，百家爭鳴|百花齐放，百家争鸣
Scientific Outlook on Development, a guiding principle for the CCP attributed to Hu Jintao 胡錦濤|胡锦涛[Hu2 Jin3 tao1], incorporated into the Constitution of the CCP in 2007
to make progress while ensuring stability
an overall plan taking into account all factors
